english.segment1: You were sittin in my picture. You had the hair of choice. As a matter of fact you thought I couldn't see through. Your silly voice
english.segment2: You're talking down but you ain't down. Quit talking down to me
english.segment3: Don't try to take my money. Its all I have this week. And don't you tell me to pick up the phone now. Spiritual beast
english.segment4: My conscious overwhelms me. That's when you get control. But you don't have the power. To make me fold
